I imported the properties, so I close this ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6084] Optimize price import by an additional DB index
item.description:
During a CSV price file import the JDBC log shows some slow SQL statements:

2474|master|141223-01:38:20:713|6 ms|statement|SELECT * FROM pricerows WHERE PK=?|SELECT * FROM pricerows WHERE PK=9432375264287
2400|master|141223-01:38:20:937|228 ms|statement|SELECT  item_t0.PK  FROM pricerows item_t0 WHERE ( item_t0.p_unitfactor  =  ?  AND  item_t0.p_currency  =  ?  AND  item_t0.p_catalogversion  =  ?  AND  item_t0.p_priceconditioniderp  =  ?  AND  item_t0.p_minqtd  =  ?  AND  item_t0.p_product  =  ?  AND  item_t0.p_ug  =  ?) AND (item_t0.TypePkString=? )|SELECT  item_t0.PK  FROM pricerows item_t0 WHERE ( item_t0.p_unitfactor  =  1  AND  item_t0.p_currency  =  8796125823009  AND  item_t0.p_catalogversion  =  8796093153881  AND  item_t0.p_priceconditioniderp  =  'Movex110353657320'  AND  item_t0.p_minqtd  =  3  AND  item_t0.p_product  =  8800435568641  AND  item_t0.p_ug  =  8796132573275) AND (item_t0.TypePkString=8796129067090 )

item.summary: Optimize price import by an additional DB index

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The import currently takes 1 hour for 582874 lines.

23 Dec 2014 00:15:29 INFO  [task-scheduler-7] (00004FQR) [Importer] Finished 1 pass in 0d 01h:00m:00s:682ms - processed: 582874, dumped: 461 (last pass: 0)

I assume the import can be speed up by a factor of 5.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6082] Refactoring of the business process
item.description: Sometimes the business process are failing. So we have to refactor the processing of some business process (ex. RMA, SeminarRegistration, EducationRegistration, ...)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Florian: Please check the translations for the email. I found out that at least the sender name is not translated for the EE countries, so it is always "Customerservice"

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6079] DE // Change namings on cart review page
item.description:
Please change the following namings:

  • "Kostenstelle und Projektnummer" to "Projektnummer"
  • Remove the text: You can add an internal reference text/number to this order to help internal processes.
    Distrelec will not use this reference.
  • On the red button "Kaufen" to "Zahlungspflichtig bestellen"

Could you please show me the last point locally before checking in?
item.summary: DE // Change namings on cart review page

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6073] Ariba // Automated form submit

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks!

Future Improvement: Add loading icon

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6071] SEO - URL Migration Issue - Hybris 404 - Fallback on homepage
item.description:
Observations :

  • The functionnality setup here : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5904 is working succesfully.
  • We still have migration issue on distrelec.de & ch due to not migrable pattern of url.
  • This issue still generate 50k of 404.

Impacts :

  • In order to redirect User & Bot properly to the new plateform, simple fallback redirection rules must be installed.

Demands :

  • Deploy on the entire hybris plateform the same "error fallback redirection on 404" system as deployed on cz/ro/hu last week.

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Migration Issue - Hybris 404 - Fallback on homepage

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Committed in v3.1. Modified the essential data site.impex files accordingly. Also modified the used websites on P, to redirect to the homepage in case of a 404.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6067] Doubled units and missing technical data
item.description:
We get double units and missing technical data for some of our products (detected in CH-DE so far):

http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=diode

http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Diskrete-Halbleiter-R%C3%B6hren/Dioden/Diodennetzwerke/Diodennetzwerke%2C-Single-In-Line/c/cat-DC-71109

Please check the import & display.
item.summary: Doubled units and missing technical data

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: SEM impact : if this issue is spreading, it will dramatically impact the advertising campaign using the search.

This ticket has been solved in two steps:

  • first step we have quick fixed using an update sql query on the production db at runtime. This has removed the unnecessary units.
  • second step we have fixed the pim import.

The pim import must be tested in Q.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6038] CHFR - Error displaying Search Campaign
item.description:
Search results display incorrectly when one of the specs ocupies too much space.
http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=2014_X_Mas_IT&log=internal&removetitle=true

Look for the gps TomTom Start 60 EU

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6006] CC-Payment not working with saved credentials
item.description:
Issue
Payment with creditcard is not working if saved credentials are used. Please investigate.

User: distrelec.testing+b2bHU@gmail.com
pw: distrelec
item.summary: CC-Payment not working with saved credentials

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please check, thx.
Status?

Hi Rafael,

Together with Ruben we identify that "Pay Now" Button has some javascript problem on click. Ruben is investigating it further for javascript error as it on front end side error.

Thanks

in this screen, the "creditcardholder" (Name on the credit card) is missing, that's why the form is not transmitted.
Investigating how we can get this name

BE task:

First of all, we need to add the parameter about the CreditCardHolder the same way as the rest of them. (EvoDistPaymentParamsStrategy.java)

paymentParameters.put("CCSelect", deuCSPaymentModeCode);
paymentParameters.put("PCNr", ccPaymentInfo.getNumber());
paymentParameters.put("PCNRBrand", deuCSPaymentModeCode);
paymentParameters.put("PCNRYear", ccPaymentInfo.getValidToYear());
paymentParameters.put("PCNRMonth", ccPaymentInfo.getValidToMonth());

The name of this parameter should be provided by EVO.

Please reassign to BE

Hi Ruben,

The value of the parameter was missing. I added on backend side and tested it. It's working fine now in the local env.

So the right fix has been applied.

Hi Rafael,

This is ready for testing.

Hi Neeraj,
Payment works! Please have a look at the screenshot. Please add Title like "Card Holder" and move the First-&Lastname to the right. thanks.

Hi Rafael,

These changes are front end changes , so assigning this to FE

I've send some modifications in the template to EVO payments.
The Credit Card Holder display was not OK.
We have to wait till they upload it to test.
Validated on TEST

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5895] Styling is not correct in checkout for delivery/payment modes
item.description: The styling seems not to be correct the price and the description is not properly aligned.
item.summary: Styling is not correct in checkout for delivery/payment modes

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
I've switched the positions of Delivery Price and Delivery description.
It makes more sense, cause usually the Delivery Description is empty.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5718] Redesign of cart review page
item.description:
Requirement

  • Initial Situation:
    • The customers don't want to scroll down to see a nice overview about their order data.
  • Requirement:
    • Remove all customer related data from the bottom to the top to have it directly on one line.

Specification: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/911-8+Redesign+Review+Cart

Next Steps
Specification
Estimate
Implementation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

Hi Ruben,
The edit icons are missing.
Could you please do the following modification to aligne the content (screenshot)?
If the text is longer then 18 digits please add ...

Please test after the next deployment
thanks
